name: p_infect
description: Pr(Person infects contact | Person makes contact with contact).

name: mu_incubation
description: Incubation period is LogNormal(mu, sigma). Estimated at mu=1.52, sigma=0.58.

name: mu_infectious
description: Infectious period is LogNormal(mu, sigma). Asymptomatic cases recover after infectious period

name: shape_onset2test
description: Time between onset of symptoms and taking a test is Gamma(shape, scale)

name: b0
description: Duration of symptoms | symptoms ~ LogNormal(b0 + b1*Ward + b2*ICU + b3*Vent + b4*age, s)
source: To be estimated from DHHS data

name: b1
description: b0 represents time spent at home for a person aged 0

name: alpha
description: Concentration parameter of Dirichlet distribution...for partitioning symptomatic period into states

name: p_IA_0to9
description: Pr(Most severe state is IA | age)

name: p_H_0to9
description: Pr(Most severe state is H | age)

name: p_W_0to9
description: Pr(Most severe state is W | age)

name: p_ICU_0to9
description: Pr(Most severe state is ICU | age)

name: p_V_0to9
description: Pr(Most severe state is V | age)

name: p_death_0to9
description: Pr(Most severe state is Death | age)
